text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, Trainer! 
What do you think's inside this box?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Could it be snacks? Maybe cake? But then
again, it could be a small bird, or even
a secret message, right?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Until we open and check, 
all kinds of possibilities exist☆ 
Isn't that just marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
That's why we can let our imagination 
run wild, trying to think of the most 
marvelous outcome☆
